Design-01.Description: Design Style 01 is a Solid graphic style. Custom Text or Custom Logo (red 'RAM' in image) can be added with a border cut between it and the main stripe, can be the same color or an alternate color than the main stripe.

Design-02.Description: Design Style 02 is a Split stripe layout. The 'split' (red in image) can be cut away, or an alternate accent color. Custom Text or Custom Logo (blue 'RAM' in image) can be added with a border cut between it and the main stripe, can be the same color or an alternate color than the main stripe.

Design-03.Description: Design Style 03 is a Solid Twin stripe design. Custom Text or Custom Logo (red 'RAM' in image) can be added with a border cut between it at the main stripe, and can be the same color or an alternate color from the main stripe.

Design-04.Description: Design Style 04 is a Solid stripe with outer pinstripes. The outer pinstripe accents (red in image) can be the same, or alternate color to the main stripe. Custom Text or Custom Logo (blue 'RAM' in image) can be added with a border cut between it at the main stripe, and can be the same color or an alternate color from the main stripe.

Design-05.Description: Design Style 05 is a Solid Twin stripe with outer pinstripes graphic. The outer pinstripe accents (red in image) can be the same, or alternate color to the main twin stripes. Custom Text or Custom Logo (blue 'RAM' in image) can be added with a border cut between it at the main stripe, and can be the same color or an alternate color from the main stripe.
